markdownRemark.html: In the interest of furthering my knowledge of Ye Olde Computer Science, I’ve taken a slight interest in Functional Programming. For the neophyte, this is a different paradigm than what is generally standard programming, mostly relegated to boring university papers and phd students. However, it can have some benefit in the real world, and I’m a proponent of “knowing more” rather than “knowing less.”
